description: Top 20 SEO improvements for Ayonne.skin and ai.ayonne.skin

backlog.title: Add Organization and WebSite schema to homepage
backlog.description: The homepage lacks Organization and WebSite structured data. This is essential for brand entity establishment in Google's Knowledge Graph.

implementation.action: Add JSON-LD to layout or homepage

backlog.title: Create /api/ai-catalog endpoint for AI shopping
backlog.description: Implement the AI catalog API referenced in llms.txt to enable AI shopping assistants (ChatGPT, Perplexity) to access product data programmatically.

backlog.title: Create Anti-Aging Skincare Pillar Page
backlog.description: Build comprehensive anti-aging guide (2500+ words) targeting key anti-aging keywords. Link to all anti-aging products and support pages.

backlog.title: Add Product schema to all product pages
backlog.description: Ensure every product page on Shopify has complete Product schema including name, description, price, availability, brand, and reviews.

backlog.title: Add FAQPage schema to skin analysis page
backlog.description: The skin analysis landing page should have FAQ schema for questions about how the AI works, privacy, and what it detects.

backlog.title: Add skincare disclaimer to all product and guide pages
backlog.description: Ensure all skincare content includes the standard disclaimer: 'This content is for informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice.'

backlog.title: Fix meta description length on key pages
backlog.description: Several pages have meta descriptions that are too short (<120 chars) or too long (>160 chars). Optimize for 130-155 characters.

backlog.title: Create Niacinamide Benefits Guide
backlog.description: Comprehensive guide on niacinamide benefits, how to use it, and product recommendations. Link to niacinamide serum.

backlog.title: Add related products section to all product pages
backlog.description: Cross-link related products from the same cluster. E.g., link Vitamin C Toner to Vitamin C Lotion and Vitamin C Cleanser.

backlog.title: Add BreadcrumbList schema site-wide
backlog.description: Implement breadcrumb navigation with corresponding BreadcrumbList schema on all pages for improved SERP appearance.

backlog.title: Create How Our AI Works explainer page
backlog.description: Detailed page explaining the AI skin analysis technology for trust and E-E-A-T. Include privacy info and accuracy details.

backlog.title: Optimize LCP on homepage and skin analysis page
backlog.description: Current LCP may be above 2.5s threshold. Optimize hero images, preload critical resources, and reduce JS blocking.

backlog.title: Add answer-first sections to FAQ page
backlog.description: Restructure FAQ page to have direct answers in the first sentence, making content more extractable for AI responses.

backlog.title: Create Skin Type Quiz page
backlog.description: Interactive quiz to determine skin type, linking to appropriate products. Competitor parity feature.

backlog.title: Create Hyaluronic Acid Guide
backlog.description: Educational content on hyaluronic acid benefits, types, and how to incorporate into routine.

backlog.title: Add HowTo schema to routine-related pages
backlog.description: Pages explaining skincare routines should have HowTo schema for step-by-step rich results.

backlog.title: Link from blog/guide content to AI analyzer
backlog.description: Add contextual CTAs in guide content encouraging readers to try the free AI skin analyzer.

backlog.title: Create Men's Skincare Guide pillar page
backlog.description: Comprehensive men's skincare guide linking to all men's products and beard care items.

backlog.title: Add last-updated dates to guide pages
backlog.description: Display and schema-mark lastModified date on educational content for freshness signals.

backlog.title: Expand llms.txt with detailed product catalog
backlog.description: Add more detailed product information to llms.txt including ingredients, benefits by concern, and pricing.

prioritization_criteria.critical: Blocking issues or major opportunities affecting core functionality
prioritization_criteria.high: Significant impact on rankings or AI visibility, quick wins

implementation_notes: Changes to ayonne.skin require Shopify theme edits or manual content updates
Changes to ai.ayonne.skin can be implemented directly in this codebase
Schema changes should be validated before deployment
Content changes must include skincare disclaimers where appropriate
Avoid medical claims in all content
